nodes.text: A governor ruled the planet Gandle Ott during the early years of the New Republic in service to the Galactic Empire, and later warlord Moff Kentor Sarne. Loyal to the Moff, the governor abandoned their post when ordered to by Sarne, joining his fleet when it arrived at Gandle Ott following Sarne's defeat at Kal'Shebbol.

The governor was a competent administrator, and their abandonment of office threw the planet's political command structure into chaos. The governor was also more loyal to Moff Sarne than to the Galactic Empire.

The governor was mentioned in Death Is Remotely Possible, the third RPG adventure in The DarkStryder Campaign published by West End Games in 1995. The governor did not appear in the adventure, having left Gandle Ott prior to the commencement of the scenario.
